remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含分配给当前 的所有子 对象。The collection holds all the child objects assigned to the current . 可以添加、删除或克隆 ;执行此操作时，将添加、删除或克隆所有子树节点。You can add, remove, or clone a ; when you do this, all child tree nodes are added, removed, or cloned. 每个 可以包含其他 对象的集合。Each can contain a collection of other objects. 这可能会导致很难确定循环访问集合时在 中的位置。This can make it difficult to determine where you are in the when iterating through the collection. 若要确定树结构中的位置，请使用 属性。To determine your location in a tree structure, use the property. 可以使用 字符串值对 字符串进行分析，以确定 标签开始和结束的位置。The string can be parsed using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 标签是通过显式设置 属性设置的。The label is set by setting the property explicitly. 替代方法是使用其中一个 构造函数创建树节点，该构造函数具有表示 属性的字符串参数。The alternative is to create the tree node using one of the constructors that has a string parameter that represents the property. 如果显示了标签，则标签将显示在 图像的旁边。The label is displayed next to the image, if one is displayed. 若要在树节点旁显示图像，请将 分配给父 控件的 属性，并通过在 属性中引用其索引值来分配 。To display images next to the tree nodes, assign an to the property of the parent control and assign an by referencing its index value in the property. 将 属性设置为当 处于未选定状态时要显示的 的索引值。Set the property to the index value of the you want to display when the is in an unselected state. 同样，将 属性设置为选择 时要显示的 的索引值。Likewise, set the property to the index value of the you want to display when the is selected. 通过使用以下属性值，可以选择特定树节点并循环访问 集合： 、、、、、。Selecting specific tree nodes and iterating through the collection can be achieved by using the following property values: , , , , , . 将上述某个属性返回的 分配给 属性，以便在 控件中选择该树节点。Assign the returned by one of aforementioned properties to the property to select that tree node in the control. 可以展开树节点以显示子树节点的下一级。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 用户可以通过按 旁边的加号（+）按钮来展开 （如果显示了该按钮），也可以通过调用 方法来扩展 。The user can expand the by pressing the plus (+) button next to the , if one is displayed, or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展开 集合中的所有子树节点级别，请调用 方法。To expand all child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以通过调用 方法折叠子 级别，或者用户可以按 旁边的减号（-）按钮（如果已显示）。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus (-) button next to the , if one is displayed. 还可以调用 方法，在展开和折叠状态之间交替 。You can also call the method to alternate the between the expanded and collapsed states. 树节点可以选择性地显示复选框。Tree nodes can optionally display a check box. 若要显示复选框，请将 的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 对于处于选中状态的树节点， 属性设置为 `true`。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 控件中显示客户信息。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称，子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中，1000客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用 和 方法取消重画 ，并在 创建并绘制 对象时显示等待 。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求您有一个可以容纳 `Order` 对象集合的 `Customer` 对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求您已在 上创建 控件的实例。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的典型方案是在 或 的 事件上调用它。A typical scenario to use this method is to call it on the event of a or . > [!NOTE] > 仅当 的 属性设置为 `true`时，此方法才有效。This method only works if the property of the is set to `true`. 如果 设置为 `false`，则会引发异常，并且不会将树节点置于可编辑状态。If is set to `false`, an exception is thrown and the tree node will not be put into an editable state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户使用 编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时，将确定该位置的 ，并将其存储在名为 `mySelectedNode`的变量中。When the user right-clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点，则会将其置于可编辑状态，从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后，将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中，多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符，或者字符串为空，则会向用户发送错误通知，并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
